zh: 在这一点上，我的看法与你不同。

en: In that respect, my opinion differs from yours.
zh: 在这方面，我的意见与你不同。

en: You have him there.
zh: 你把他难住了。

en: I can't agree with you here.
zh: 在这里我不能同意你的看法。

en: In that respect, I agree with you completely.
zh: 在这方面，我完全同意你的看法。

en: We are all one on that point.
zh: 在这一点上，我们意见一致。

en: The clerk was dismissed on the grounds of her rude manners.
zh: 那个职员因为态度粗鲁而被解雇了。

en: The salesperson persuaded her to buy the dress.
zh: 那个销售员说服她买了那件连衣裙。

en: They sell imported goods at the shop.
zh: 那家商店出售进口商品。

en: The store deals in vegetables.
zh: 这家商店经营蔬菜。

en: The store opens for business tomorrow.
zh: 这家商店明天开业。

en: The shop is closed at nine every evening.
zh: 这家商店每天晚上九点关门。

en: The store can supply us with anything we need.
zh: 这家商店可以供应我们所需要的一切。

en: The store is open all the year round.
zh: 这家商店全年营业。

en: The shop is closed on Sundays.
zh: 这家商店星期天关门。

en: The shop is closed on Sunday.
zh: 这家商店星期天关门。

en: That store sells meat and fish.
zh: 那家商店卖肉和鱼。

en: The store is across the street.
zh: 商店在街对面。

en: The shop is on the corner of the street.
zh: 商店在街角。

en: The store was just off the street.
zh: 商店就在街边。

en: I hear the store is in the center of the city.
zh: 我听说商店在市中心。

en: The store raised all the prices.
zh: 商店提高了所有价格。

en: The store is notorious for charging high prices.
zh: 这家商店以高价而闻名。

en: The store was not a big one, was it?
zh: 这家商店不大，对吧？

en: The store carries earthenware.
zh: 这家商店卖陶器。

en: That is a reputable store.
zh: 那是一家信誉良好的商店。

en: The shop was crowded with young people.
zh: 商店里挤满了年轻人。

en: The store is just across from my house.
zh: 商店就在我家对面。

en: The store is close to my house.
zh: 商店离我家很近。

en: The store happened to be crowded last night.
zh: 昨晚商店碰巧很拥挤。

en: The store happened to be crowded yesterday.
zh: 昨天商店碰巧很拥挤。

en: The store is not open today.
zh: 商店今天不开门。

en: The shop is closed today.
zh: 商店今天关门。

en: The store is closed Mondays.
zh: 商店星期一关门。

en: The shop is open from Monday to Saturday.
zh: 商店从星期一到星期六营业。

en: The store is just across from the theater.
zh: 商店就在剧院对面。

en: The shop is kept under police supervision.
zh: 这家商店受到警方监管。

en: The shop carried leather goods.
zh: 这家商店卖皮革制品。

en: The store was crowded with holiday shoppers.
zh: 商店里挤满了假日购物者。

en: The store has a large stock of wines.
zh: 这家商店有大量的葡萄酒库存。

en: The store offered special discounts during the summer.
zh: 这家商店在夏季提供特别折扣。

en: The store might be closed already.
zh: 商店可能已经关门了。

en: The shop is just in front of the station.
zh: 商店就在车站正前方。

en: The store has numerous items to sell.
zh: 这家店有很多商品出售。

en: Is the store near at hand?
zh: 商店在附近吗？

en: The store lost its trade to the supermarket.
zh: 这家店的生意被超市抢走了。

en: When is the store open till?
zh: 商店营业到几点？

en: The store closes at seven.
zh: 商店七点关门。

en: The store closes at eleven.
zh: 商店十一点关门。

en: Running the store is becoming a burden to him.
zh: 经营这家店对他来说成了一种负担。

en: I go near that store myself.
zh: 我自己去那家商店附近。

en: The shop windows display the latest fashion.
zh: 商店橱窗展示着最新的时尚。

en: We found only a small number of customers in the store.
zh: 我们在店里只找到了少量的顾客。

en: There was no one in the shop to wait on me.
zh: 店里没有人招待我。

en: There were not more than ten customers in the shop.
zh: 店里顾客不超过十个。

en: There's only one store on the island.
zh: 岛上只有一家商店。

en: I met her in the store by accident.
zh: 我在商店里偶然遇到了她。

en: Foreign books are sold at the shop.
zh: 这家商店出售外国书籍。

en: The shop sells a variety of goods.
zh: 这家商店出售各种各样的商品。

en: They marked the damaged goods down by 40%.
zh: 他们将损坏的商品降价40%。

en: The shop sells expensive accessories for women.
zh: 这家商店出售昂贵的女性饰品。

en: They sell sugar at the store.
zh: 他们在商店里卖糖。

en: They sell textbooks at the bookstore.
zh: 他们在书店里卖教科书。

en: At that store, they deal in fish and meat.
zh: 在那家商店，他们经营鱼和肉。

en: They deal in shoes and clothes at that store.
zh: 在那家商店，他们经营鞋子和衣服。

en: They sell candy, cookies and what not.
zh: 他们卖糖果、饼干等等。

en: The shop sells articles of all kinds.
zh: 这家商店出售各种各样的商品。

en: At that shop they deal in kitchen utensils.
zh: 那家商店经营厨房用具。

en: Put what you get at the store to my account.
zh: 把你从店里拿到的东西记在我的账上。

en: The exhibition will be held next month.
zh: 展览会将于下个月举行。

en: The exhibition was a product of his imagination.
zh: 展览是他想象力的产物。

en: The exhibition is well worth a visit.
zh: 这个展览非常值得一看。

en: The exhibition is now open.
zh: 展览现在开放了。

en: The exhibition offers profound insights into ancient civilization.
zh: 这次展览提供了对古代文明的深刻见解。

en: That observatory stands in a good location.
zh: 那座天文台地理位置很好。

en: Three persons were killed and ten were severely or slightly injured in the railway accident.
zh: 铁路事故造成三人死亡，十人重伤或轻伤。

en: The railroad is now in the process of construction.
zh: 铁路现在正在建设中。

en: The railroad divides into two after the bridge.
zh: 铁路在桥后分成两条。

en: Rust ate away the iron bar.
zh: 铁锈腐蚀了铁条。

en: The drowning man grasped at the rope.
zh: 溺水的人抓住了绳子。

en: The burglar is used to staying up late.
zh: 窃贼习惯熬夜。

en: The thief was traced by the stolen goods.
zh: 小偷因赃物而被追踪到。

en: The thief ran fast.
zh: 小偷跑得很快。

en: The robber tried to plunge the knife into the boy.
zh: 强盗试图将刀刺入男孩体内。

en: The thief admitted his guilt.
zh: 小偷承认了自己的罪行。

en: The thief ran away at the sight of a policeman.
zh: 小偷一看到警察就跑了。

en: The thief ran away at the sight of a detective.
zh: 小偷一看到侦探就跑了。

en: The thief disguised himself as a policeman.
zh: 小偷把自己伪装成警察。

en: The thief disguised himself as an old lady.
zh: 小偷把自己伪装成一位老太太。

en: The thief reluctantly admitted his guilt.
zh: 小偷不情愿地承认了自己的罪行。

en: How did the thief manage to avoid being caught?
zh: 小偷是如何设法避免被抓住的？

en: The robber stood surrounded by ten policemen.
zh: 强盗被十名警察包围着。
